attributes.action: Reduce UK Population - cut welfare payments and benefits paid for any 4th or further children borne to an individual parent
attributes.additional_details: This small country of ours is over-populated with too many of its inhabitants taking from the system yet not contributing towards it. I propose a voluntary cap on sizes of families with benefits being withdrawn for any children beyond a 3rd child (any family wishing to bring more than 3 children into this world should be able to financially support that extended family without government support) This can be seen as a first step towards capping our already bulging population
